title: Michael Sampson
text:
I work as a data analyst at Inclusiv. When I can, I:

compost at Abyssinian Tot Lot
take care of some street trees near me and
maintain trails in Highbridge Park

My lifelong project is to cook every recipe in Marie Simmons’ The Good Egg
photo: Hide, 2019 from Julia Chiang’s Spit Sweat Shhh exhibit at The Modern Institute, Glasgow (link)
